HL7v2xStaticDef.EventDesc: HL7 Version 2.5.1 Implementation Guide for Immunization Messaging

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The MSH.1 (Field Separator) field SHALL be valued "|"
The MSH.2 (Encoding Characters) field SHALL be valued "^~\&"

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If populated, HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be valued the literal value: "ISO".
MSH-7.1 (Date/time of Message) SHALL have a degree of precision that must be at least to the minute. (Format YYYYMMDDHHMM).
MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL contain the constant value "VXU^VO4^VXU_V04"
The MSH-12 (Version ID) SHALL be valued "2.5.1"
VID-1 (Version Id) SHALL be valued with the literal "2.5.1"
The value of MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgement Type) SHALL be one of the following: AL-always, NE-Never, ER-Error/reject only, SU successful completion only

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If MSH-9.1 is valued "QBP" or "RSP"

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If populated EI.4 is populated (Universal ID Type), it shall contain the value "ISO".

Field.Name: Cyclic Group Maximum Number of Repeats

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If RXA-20 is valued "CP" or "PA" then RXA-9.1 (admin notes) SHALL be valued one of the codes listed in NIP001 in the first occurrence of this field and the following occurrence should be empty or valued with text notes.

If RXA-20 is valued "CP" or "PA" and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 is valued "00" and RXA-5.1 is valued with a CVX code from table PHVS_VISVaccines_IIS (See Appendix A) then for each vaccine information statement that was shared there SHALL be: one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued "69764-9" (bar coded) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued "29769-7" (presentation /delivery date) associated. Both OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4 OR one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued "30956-7" (vaccine type) and one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued "29768-9" (version date) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued "29769-7" (presentation /delivery date) associated. All three OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4

If RXA-20 is valued "CP" or "PA" and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Administration Note code) is valued "00" then the message SHALL include an OBX segment associated with the RXA with OBX-3.1 shall equal "64994-7" . This OBX will indicate the Patient Eligibility Category for Vaccine Funding Program.
RXA-1 ( Give Sub-id counter) ) SHALL be valued "0" Note that "0" is zero.
RXA-2 (admin Sub-id) SHALL be valued "1"
If RXA-4 (Date time of admin end ) is populated, then it SHALL be the same as Start time (RXA-3)

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If the RXA-18 (Refusal Reason) is populated, RXA-20 (completion Status) SHALL be valued to "RE".

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If RXA-5.1 (vaccine administered) has a CVX of 998 (no vaccine administered) then RXA-20 shall be populated with "NA".

If CWE.1(Identifier) is valued
If CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued
If CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The Value of OBX-1 (Set ID-OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1" within a given segment group.
The value of OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be one of the following: CE, NM, ST, DT, ID or TS

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OBX-3.1 is "30956-7" and OBX-2 is "CE" then the value set for OBX-5 shall be CVX.
If OBX-3.1 is "69764-9" and OBX-2 is "CE" then the value set for OBX-5 shall be cdcgs1vis.
If OBX-3.1 is "64994-7" and OBX-2 is "CE" then the value set for OBX-5 shall be HL70064.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OBX-2(Value Type) is valued "NM" or "SN"
If CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) SHALL be "F"
